publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: you will be reborn in the Heavenly Realm

sense.def: first of the Three Realms 三界 (梵眾天，梵補天，大梵天)
其此語

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Then he assembled the instrument to inject the liquid

sense.def: syringe
marks a judgmental question sentence 何謂也What does this mean?

seg.line: 云何頃來而不造作如是之樓？」

tls:text.tls:srcline: 云何頃來而不造作如是之樓？」

sense.def: 如是之樓“a building like that": VP adjectivally modifying nominal head
resemble; be like
may be properly compared to, be comparable to the case of (typically but not always with understood subject)
may be properly compared with S
A place were dramatic performances are held.
know for certain

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: If he had debt

sense.def: if (contrary to fact) GY: 若其予之 若其有知 "if they have awareness"

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: then even if you got a thousand heads in return,

sense.def: even if, contrary to conceivable fact

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and misguidedly hope for worldly delightes.

sense.def: hope for; place one's hope and expectation in

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: they have hope in their minds

sense.def: hope

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: they have hope in their minds

sense.def: hope

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: They asked: "Does the sublunar world>the world-as-we-know-it count as existing or as non-existing?"

sense.def: 天下之物 the sublunar world; all there is under Heaven; the sublunar world

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The monks are also like this:

sense.def: BUDDH: Buddhist monk; skr. bikṣu

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and indeed it turned out (to his mind) to be his own wife.

sense.def: believe that S

tls:line.title: 百喻經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Once upon a time there was a man

sense.def: a; a certain; some

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and in every way he practised generosity.

sense.def: BUDDH: giving, making offerings (to the Buddha or the monks/nuns); SANSKRIT dāna[pāramitā]

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: he was hoping for an ample sugary flavour,

sense.def: hope (intensely, often vainly) to V

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: The host offered him something to eat,

sense.def: in the company of the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: The host treated him to a meal ,

sense.def: host; master of ceremonies; pater familias

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: the host added some salt ***for his guest.

sense.def: man-made salt; salt; sodium chloride

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: the host added some salt ***for his guest.

sense.def: add N1 to the contextually determinate N2

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: With the salt, the food tasting wonderful

sense.def: become tasty; become more tasty

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: With the salt, the food tasting wonderful

sense.def: when... then

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "The reason why it is wonderful

sense.def: become tasty; become more tasty

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: is all because of the salt.

sense.def: because of/ conditioned by S (therefore V)

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: is all because there was the salt.

sense.def: because 緣有x故

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: how much more so with a still larger amount.

sense.def: comparatively: be more (than otherwise)

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and contrary to his intentions the salt became his misfortune.

sense.def: suffering

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and contrary to his intentions the salt became his misfortune.

sense.def: become (a ruler; a misfortune etc.)

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and contrary to his intentions the salt became his misfortune.

sense.def: 惡其賊 "hates his malefactors": npro is the object of the transitivity in Ntr

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: The fool stands for those dissenters:

sense.def: those (slanderers etc)

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: They hear that by controlling what they drink and eat they can obtain the Buddhist Way

sense.def: learn that S, hear that S

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Some survive for seven days,

sense.def: (an amount of time) passed

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Some survive for seven days,

sense.def: day, the length of a day counted as day-time; day on which something is to be done>date

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: others survive for fifteen days.

sense.def: day, the length of a day counted as day-time; day on which something is to be done>date

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: They are like that fool:

sense.def: 民如野鹿“The people are like wild deer": be like, look like, act like (what) 何如

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: They are like that fool:

sense.def: those (slanderers etc)

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: They are like that fool:

sense.def: the fool

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Because of the good taste of salt he went ahead and ate nothing else.

sense.def: because of the reason S

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Because of the good taste of salt he went ahead and ate nothing else.

sense.def: only the object (without anything else)

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Because of the good taste of salt he went ahead and ate nothing else.

sense.def: man-made salt; salt; sodium chloride

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Because of the good taste of salt he went ahead and ate nothing else.

sense.def: 以鹽美故 "because the salt was particulalry savoury"

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: He got to cause his mouth to feel uncomfortable,

sense.def: cause N to V, get (someone) to (do something);

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: He got to cause his mouth to feel uncomfortable,

sense.def: cause someone to go as far s to do something

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: He got to cause his mouth to feel uncomfortable,

sense.def: cause N to V

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and this is also like the case of the dissenters.

sense.def: anaphoric: this (particular aforementioned abstract but definite) item

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: 2. Once upon a time there was a fool

sense.def: a stupid person

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: 2. Once upon a time there was a fool

sense.def: Once upon a time

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: who was about to lay on a feast,

sense.def: gather together; convoke

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: On the occasion he had the following thought:

sense.def: this N (which will be identified below)

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "If I now in preparation for this day every mid-day I milk the buffalo

sense.def: Now in the present case; now, in this instance

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "If I now in preparation for this day every mid-day I milk the buffalo

sense.def: if; or if (often with implicit subject and without 則 in main clause, and note 若...是 as in 若晉常先，是楚弱也 which has many parallels. Apodosis often )

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "If I now in preparation for this day every mid-day I milk the buffalo

sense.def: on midday, at noon

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "If I now in preparation for this day every mid-day I milk the buffalo。【𤚲(gòu)：挤动物乳汁。】

sense.def: squeeze out to get

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "If I now in preparation for this day every mid-day I milk the buffalo。【𤚲(gòu)：挤动物乳汁。】

sense.def: rare: squeeze (udder etc)

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "If I now in preparation for this day every mid-day I milk the buffalo。【𤚲(gòu)：挤动物乳汁。】

sense.def: buffalo milk

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: the buffalo milk will become more and more.

sense.def: buffalo milk

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Then suddenly at some point in the end there will be nowhere to keep the milk,

sense.def: a place to put

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: It will be best to just leave it filling up the buffalo's belly.

sense.def: It is best to V!

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: It will be best to just leave it filling up the buffalo's belly.

sense.def: colloquial: simply; just

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: It will be best to just leave it filling up the buffalo's belly.

sense.def: belly, stomach

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: It will be best to just leave it filling up the buffalo's belly.

sense.def: cause (something) to be filled; cause to contain; cause to hold hold (of liquid etc.)

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: I shall wait until the time for our reunion comes

sense.def: the time N2 etc, of N1 approaching

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and will then take out the milk at one go."

sense.def: squeeze out to get

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: When he had made these thoughts

sense.def: this N (which will be identified below)

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: he then got hold of a buffalo, mother and daughter,

sense.def: female buffalo

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and tied each of them up in different places.

sense.def: each object

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and tied each of them up in different places.

sense.def: tie to a thing to something else; tie up so as to assemble; keep tied up

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and he received and placed his guests.

sense.def: the guests of various kinds

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Only then did he pull along the buffalo

sense.def: drag along

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and he wanted to milk her.

sense.def: squeeze out to get

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: But the milk of this buffalo had already dried up and there was none left.

sense.def: this person; these people (mostly plural) =此人; this concrete thing = 此物

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: But the milk of this buffalo had already dried up and there was none left.

sense.def: buffalo milk

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: But the milk of this buffalo had already dried up and there was none left.

sense.def: be completely lacking in (life-giving) humidity, dead dry; be dry; be dried

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: At this time he was either stared at angrily or laughed at by the guests.

sense.def: at that time

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: At this time he was either stared at angrily or laughed at by the guests.

sense.def: the large number of, all the many, all the various, all sorts of

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: At this time he was either stared at angrily or laughed at by the guests.

sense.def: distinguished guest

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: At this time he was either stared at angrily or laughed at by the guests.

sense.def: stare in anger at the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: At this time he was either stared at angrily or laughed at by the guests.

sense.def: laugh at the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: The fools are also like this:

sense.def: the stupid

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: The fools are also like this:

sense.def: likewise, also, as under the circumstances specified in S2

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Let's wait until I have a lot of the stuff,

sense.def: wait until S

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Let's wait until I have a lot of the stuff,

sense.def: wait for (something desirable); wait until; wait for (a period of time); expect

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and only then will I make the donations at one go.

sense.def: only under these logical conditions

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Before they have accumulated the stuff

sense.def: not yet (at that time)

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: or indeed they may end their lives,

sense.def: or

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: without ever getting to make their donations at the proper times.

sense.def: in due course; at the appropriate time; when the need arises Note 非時

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: That person (in the above story) is the same as these.

sense.def: those contextually determinate people; that contextually determinate person

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: That person (in the above story) is the same as these.

sense.def: likewise, also, as under the circumstances specified in S2

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: That person (in the above story) is the same as these.

sense.def: be like this, be such; be a case in point; be in such a state

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: At that time there was a person

sense.def: at this time; during this period

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: At the time the fool endured the situation without saying a word.

sense.def: at this time; during this period

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: At the time the fool endured the situation without saying a word.

sense.def: this, these 此人

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: At the time the fool endured the situation without saying a word.

sense.def: the fool

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: He did not have the good sense to escape.

sense.def: avoid so as to get away

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: addressed him as follows:

sense.def: report to; let somebody know; post-Han sometimes: tell someone to carry out the instruction in the speech 語人曰

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: addressed him as follows:

sense.def: (rarely with indirect speech or quasi indirect speech) say S; say that S

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "Why aren't you getting away

sense.def: you surely should, why don't you

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: but stay put and expose yourself to this beating

sense.def: SHU: but

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: but stay put and expose yourself to this beating

sense.def: stay put; stay in place

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: The fool replied as follows:

sense.def: the fool

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: The fool replied as follows:

sense.def: answer the contextually determinate N: "S" (short for 答之言)

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: People like these are arrogant and throw their weight about.

sense.def: 民如野鹿“The people are like wild deer": be like, look like, act like (what) 何如

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: People like these are arrogant and throw their weight about.

sense.def: rely on (what one holds in one's hands or more abstractly has); depend on; rely on the help of

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: People like these are arrogant and throw their weight about.

sense.def: the strength of N

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: So they smash my head with a pear-tree stick, that's how it was."

sense.def: come to pass; be like this; happen in such a way

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: So they smash my head with a pear-tree stick, that's how it was."

sense.def: using; with; on the basis of

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: So they smash my head with a pear-tree stick, that's how it was."

sense.def: using; with; on the basis of

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "You're silly as hell yourself!

sense.def: e.g. 汝"you (my son), familiar, informal you

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: How can you call these people names and consider them to be silly?

sense.def: consider the contextually determinate object as V; consider that the contextually determinate object Vs

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: How can you call these people names and consider them to be silly?

sense.def: post-Han???: idiotic, moronic, dim-witted

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: If you were not silly,

sense.def: e.g. 汝"you (my son), familiar, informal you

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: If you were not silly,

sense.def: idiotic, moronic, dim-witted

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: then would you have been beaten by them,

sense.def: be V-ed by N

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: they are unable to fully npractise asceticism, to be faithful to prohibitions and to listen to wisdom.

sense.def: become cultivated; enter proper self-cultivation

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: they are unable to fully npractise asceticism, to be faithful to prohibitions and to listen to wisdom.

sense.def: an ability to engage in profound and thorough reflection; discursive cleverness; BUDDH: the highest form of religious consciousness and insight, and one of the perfections of the Boddhisattva. Sanskrit prajñā.

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: Once upon a time there was a fool,

sense.def: a stupid person

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: As time passed, she had relations with other men,

sense.def: the meantime

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: As time passed, she had relations with other men,

sense.def: afterwards

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and her wicked lecherousness got stronger.

sense.def: mindset, typical inclinations of an N; attitude of an N; attitude of the N; attitude typical of the N

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: She desired to team up with a lover

sense.def: aim to and desire to; intend

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: She desired to team up with a lover

sense.def: side husband> illicit lover

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: At this point she secretly told an old lady:

sense.def: so therefore; for this reason, and thus, and so

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: At this point she secretly told an old lady:

sense.def: as follows: S 念言; which runs as follows 作是念言

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "After I am gone,

sense.def: leave the place, go away; leave the scene

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: "After I am gone,

sense.def: after the time N

seg.line: 汝可齎一死婦女屍安著屋中，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 汝可齎一死婦女屍安著屋中，

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: you should place a lady's corpse here in the house,

sense.def: take along, carry along, bring along

tls:text.tls:srcline: 汝可齎一死婦女屍安著屋中，

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: you should place a lady's corpse here in the house,

sense.def: put the contextually determinate N1 in the place N2

tls:text.tls:srcline: 汝可齎一死婦女屍安著屋中，

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: you should place a lady's corpse here in the house,

sense.def: the inside of, in

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and you you must talk to my husband

sense.def: the husband of the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: and you you must talk to my husband

sense.def: (rarely with indirect speech or quasi indirect speech) say S; say that S

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: who, having heard deviant preachings

sense.def: offending; dissenting; heretical

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: produce confused intellectual attachments in their minds,

sense.def: misguided; unclear; confused (and deluded); deranged

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: they will not believe in it or accept it.

sense.def: accept to keep the contextually determinate N

seg.line: 《百喻經》卷第一【序】 聞如是：

tls:text.tls:srcline: 《百喻經》卷第一【序】 聞如是：

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: INTRODUCTION Introduction. 【Chavannes 1911: Dans l'édition de Corée que suit le Tripitaka de Tôkyô, ce préambule est placé à la fin du chapitre I; mais il est manifeste qu'on doit le reporter en tête de ce chapitre, comme le font, d'ailleurs, les trois éditions des Song, des Yuan et des Ming.】 I have (personally) heard the following: 【The Sanskrit is passive： mayā "by me"! 】

sense.def: have heard from an authoritative source

tls:text.tls:srcline: 《百喻經》卷第一【序】 聞如是：

tls:line.title: Baiyujing 百喻经: A First Draft Translation

tls:text.tls:line: INTRODUCTION Introduction. 【Chavannes 1911: Dans l'édition de Corée que suit le Tripitaka de Tôkyô, ce préambule est placé à la fin du chapitre I; mais il est manifeste qu'on doit le reporter en tête de ce chapitre, comme le font, d'ailleurs, les trois éditions des Song, des Yuan et des Ming.】 I have (personally) heard the following: 【The Sanskrit is passive： mayā "by me"! 】

sense.def: conform exactly to Npro, be exactly as in Npro
